content: I'm glad I picked up "The Song of Achilles" based on the staff recommendation; now I'm even more excited to dive into these new titles. By the way, I've been meaning to get back to "The Nightingale" by Kristin Hannah, which I put down temporarily because it was getting too emotional - do you think I'll be able to finish it in time for our next book club discussion if I dedicate my daily commute to it?
